description.en: Data technology at University of Bergen woo.
Took classes for Sales and Service, followed by a year of ICT classes.

description.no: Eit flott år med flinke lærara, godt sosialt miljø og mykje musikk.
description.en: A great year with good teachers, good social environment and a lot of music.

description.no: Fullførte fagbrevet. Lærte mykje om Windows Server og dagleg drift av forskjellige datasystem.
description.en: Completed my trade certificate as an ICT consultant. During the time I learned a lot about Windows Server and the daily running of many different computer systems.

description.no: Generell studiekompetanse (Norsk, Matte, Historie, Naturfag) og Spesiell studiekompetanse (Matte R1+R2, Teknologi og Forskning 1+2).
description.en: General (Norwegian, Maths, History, Science) and Special (Maths R1+R2, Technology and Research 1+2).
